Text: Potential New DebtorsWith the exception of the EECC EEOS and OEC none of the entities listed in my previous email will be filed without confirmation from at least one of you Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

Information RequestRichard following up on my voice mail of yesterday evening I am responsible for putting together the application that will be filed with the court regarding retention of Weil Gotshal In connection therewith we must disclose to the court all potential conflicts between parties in interest that are adverse to Enron who may also be clients of the Firm In that regard I need the following information A list of secured creditors of the potential debtor entities broken down by entity A list of landlords for each entity A list of outside law firms who perform significant work on behalf of the potential debtors broken down by entitiy if possible Ill leave it to your judgment what constitutes significant We clearly dont want to have to run through our conflicts system each and every law firm that you employ I think the best way to draw the line would be law firms to which you routinely pay more than per month It may be that this number is or or more A current list of officers and directors for Enron Corp I have lists for the other entities from another source We have a list of banks that are lenders to various of the Enron entities Can you easily identify banks as to which the only relationship is that Corp has guaranteed an obligation of a nondebtor subsidiary If so that would be helpful information to have NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you
